txt.en: Sarnemil is at Torech Ullug, south of Echad Candelleth and on the eastern bank of the river by the rapids that flow out of Tâl Bruinen.\n\nYou have defeated Sarlug and many Rock-worms, but Sarnemil escaped; however, you saw her flee to the south along the course of the Bruinen. You should return down the slopes to the Bruinen and search southward along the banks for her lair.
You have delayed too long, and too many rock-wormlings have hatched
From the heights of Cirith Ulunn, you saw the rock-worm Sarnemil fleeing to the south along the course of the Bruinen.

Sarnemil is at Torech Ullug, south of Echad Candelleth and on the eastern bank of the river by the rapids that flow out of Tâl Bruinen.\n\nYou have defeated Sarlug and many Rock-worms, but Sarnemil escaped; however, you saw her flee to the south along the course of the Bruinen. You should return down the slopes to the Bruinen and search southward along the banks for her lair.
You should return down the slopes to the Bruinen and search southward along the banks for Sarnemil's lair

Sarnemil is at Torech Ullug, south of Echad Candelleth and on the eastern bank of the river by the rapids that flow out of Tâl Bruinen.\n\nYou have defeated Sarlug and many Rock-worms, but Sarnemil escaped; however, you saw her flee to the south along the course of the Bruinen. You should return down the slopes to the Bruinen and search southward along the banks for her lair.

'I am pleased at your return, [placeholder]! I do not have much, but for the slayer of Sarlug and Sarnemil, I will offer you what I may. Tâl Bruinen is safer for your efforts, and I am glad that it is so.'

Daervellas is at Echad Candelleth, the Elf-camp in Tâl Bruinen, north of Torech Ullug.\n\nYou have defeated Sarnemil and ended the threat of her offspring. You should now return to Daervellas with this news.
'You will find Sarnemil at Torech Ullug, south of here on the east bank of the river near the rapids that leave Tâl Bruinen.'
'Sarlug and Sarnemil are no more, and we owe it to you, [placeholder]!'
'Fewer rock-worms endanger now the peace of Tâl Bruinen.'
